mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, t.CUSTOMER_TYPE customerType, t.MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone, t.CERT_TYPE certType, t.CERT_NO certNo, t.CERT_ISSUE_DATE certIssueDate, t.CERT_FAIL_DATE certFailDate, t.SEX sex, t.address address, t.user_id userId, t.isvalid isvalid, t.has_acount hasAccount, t.bank_id bankId, t.CREATE_TIME createTime, t.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, t.BIRTHDATE birthdate, t.EDUCATION education, t.MARITAL_STATUS maritalStatus, t.EMER_CONTACT emerContact, t.EMER_CONTACT_MOBILE emerContactMobile FROM `t_gq_customer_info` t

SELECT t.id id, t.CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, t.CUSTOMER_TYPE customerType, t.MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone, t.CERT_TYPE certType, t.CERT_NO certNo, t.CERT_ISSUE_DATE certIssueDate, t.CERT_FAIL_DATE certFailDate, t.SEX sex, t.address address, t.user_id userId, t.isvalid isvalid, t.has_acount hasAccount, t.bank_id bankId, t.CREATE_TIME createTime, t.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, t.BIRTHDATE birthdate, t.EDUCATION education, t.MARITAL_STATUS maritalStatus, t.EMER_CONTACT emerContact, t.EMER_CONTACT_MOBILE emerContactMobile, b.bank_long_name bankLongName, b.bank_no bankNo FROM `t_gq_customer_info` t LEFT JOIN `t_gq_bank_info` b ON t.id=b.cust_id
mapper.select: SELECT t.id id, t.CUSTOMER_NAME customerName, t.MOBILE_PHONE mobilePhone, t.CERT_NO certNo, t.CUSTOMER_TYPE customerType, t.CERT_TYPE certType, t.SEX sex, t.user_id userId, t.isvalid isvalid, t.has_acount hasAccount, t.bank_id bankId, t.BIRTHDATE birthdate, t.EDUCATION education, t.MARITAL_STATUS maritalStatus, t.EMER_CONTACT emerContact, t.EMER_CONTACT_MOBILE emerContactMobile FROM `t_gq_customer_info` t WHERE t.CERT_NO=#{certNo}

and t.id like CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
and t.CUSTOMER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and t.CERT_NO like CONCAT('%',#{certNo},'%')
and t.MOBILE_PHONE like CONCAT('%',#{mobile},'%')
and date_format(t.create_time,'%Y%m%d') >= #{startTime}
and date_format(t.create_time,'%Y%m%d') <= #{endTime}
order by t.create_time desc
